item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 17, 2024 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Everything Is Just Functions: Mind-Blowing Insights from SICP and David Beazley (81 points | 29 comments)
2. Bpftune uses BPF to auto-tune Linux systems (126 points | 30 comments)
3. The bucket brigade device: An analog shift register (19 points | 4 comments)
4. Huawei developing SSD-tape hybrid amid US tech restrictions (25 points | 19 comments)
5. All-in-one embedding model for interleaved text, images, and screenshots (165 points | 18 comments)
6. Constraints in Go (105 points | 49 comments)
7. Garak, LLM Vulnerability Scanner (57 points | 14 comments)
8. Memos – An open source Rewinds / Recall (37 points | 7 comments)
9. Show HN: Zyme – An Evolvable Programming Language (58 points | 13 comments)
10. CSS gets a new logo and it uses the color `rebeccapurple` (619 points | 128 comments)
11. The Bluesky firehose viewed in the style of a Windows XP screensaver (425 points | 110 comments)
12. Claude AI built me a React app to compare maps side by side (86 points | 79 comments)
13. ML in Go with a Python Sidecar (9 points | discuss)
14. James Gleick's Chaos: The Software (214 points | 24 comments)
15. The myth that you can’t build interactive web apps except as single page app (74 points | 49 comments)
16. Sentence Structure for Writers (2017) (33 points | 20 comments)
17. Two Nobel Prize winners want to cancel their own CRISPR patents in Europe (86 points | 63 comments)
18. Cloudflare.com's Robots.txt (84 points | 27 comments)
19. SICP: The only computer science book worth reading twice? (2010) (405 points | 159 comments)
20. How to setup self hosted wiki for your startup (44 points | 12 comments)
21. Battery-Free Bioelectronic Implants (3 points | 1 comment)
22. Unit Testing Numerical Routines (54 points | 23 comments)
23. Teach yourself to echolocate (2018) (197 points | 52 comments)
24. Recovering from a kidney donation (55 points | 43 comments)
25. Two galaxies aligned in a way where their gravity acts as a compound lens (254 points | 85 comments)
26. James Webb Space Telescope finds evidence for alternate theory of gravity (327 points | 148 comments)
27. Can Injection: keyless car theft (2023) (50 points | 24 comments)
28. YC is wrong about LLMs for chip design (222 points | 188 comments)
29. DIMM vs. Udimm vs. Rdimm vs. Sodimm vs. Cudimm: What's the Difference? (35 points | 4 comments)
30. Effect of a giant meteorite impact on Paleoarchean environment and life (125 points | 48 comments)
